fields.name: > Mine Wo Matoishi Kiyotaki
fields.value:
Ayato's Elemental Skill gains the following properties: After it is used, Ayato will gain two Namisen stacks; amd when the water illusion explodes, Ayato will gain a Namisen effect equal to the maximum number of stacks possible.
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*

fields.name: > Michiyuku Hagetsu
fields.value:
If Ayato is not on the field and his Energy is less than 40, he will regenerate two Energy for himself every second.
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*

fields.name: > Daily Cooking
fields.value:
When Ayato cooks a dish perfectly, there’s an 18% chance that he receives an additional ‘suspicious’ dish of the same variety.
*Unlocked Automatically*
